## Econometrics I

Foundations in causal inference, regression diagnostics, and empirical strategy design.

- **Format:** weekly lecture + lab sessions.
- **Core materials:** [Syllabus](files/teaching/econometrics/syllabus.pdf), [Lecture 1 Slides](files/teaching/econometrics/lecture-1.pdf).
- **Assessment:** problem sets + applied replication exercise.

## Microeconomics

Decision-making under uncertainty, consumer theory, and equilibrium analysis with applied problem sets.

- **Format:** lecture + tutorials.
- **Core materials:** [Syllabus](files/teaching/microeconomics/syllabus.pdf), [Problem Set 1](files/teaching/microeconomics/problem-set-1.pdf).
- **Assessment:** midterm + data-driven case study.

## Public Policy Analysis

Evidence-based policy evaluation with a focus on public finance and program design.

- **Format:** lecture + policy lab.
- **Core materials:** [Syllabus](files/teaching/public-policy/syllabus.pdf), [Policy Briefing](files/teaching/public-policy/briefing.pdf).
- **Assessment:** policy memo + presentation.
